channel.title: Comments on: Jhai PC photos
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Ralf
item.dc:creator: Ralf
item.description:
Where can the Jhai PC be contacted? I help with educational projects in hill-tribe villages in North Thailand. This is a great idea.
Ralf
item.content:encoded:
Where can the Jhai PC be contacted? I help with educational projects in hill-tribe villages in North Thailand. This is a great idea.

Ralf

item.title: By: tomas
item.dc:creator: tomas
item.description:
The project is run by the Jhai Foundation: http://www.jhai.org/
If that doesn't work send me an e-mail and I'll try to hook you up with someone from Jhai.
/Tomas
item.content:encoded:
The project is run by the Jhai Foundation: http://www.jhai.org/

If that doesn’t work send me an e-mail and I’ll try to hook you up with someone from Jhai.

/Tomas

item.title: By: m u l · t i · p l i c · i · t y
item.dc:creator: m u l · t i · p l i c · i · t y
item.description:
<strong>Bad news for Jhai...</strong>
Pedal-powered PC zapped -- villagers wait to go wireless A power surge at 3 a.m. Tuesday in the team's makeshift lab in Vientiane, the Laotian capital, did in the drives that were being used to program the little Jhai Computer. It trashed an entire wee...
item.content:encoded:
Bad news for Jhai…

Pedal-powered PC zapped — villagers wait to go wireless A power surge at 3 a.m. Tuesday in the team’s makeshift lab in Vientiane, the Laotian capital, did in the drives that were being used to program the little Jhai Computer. It trashed an entire wee…
